Uzen Kyouka universal sight (Mato Seihei no Slave)

Late night project, but turned out good.

As always if you liked it leave a like, Thanks!

(If you have special requests tell me!)

#anime #sight #matoseiheinoslave #uzenkyouka

its my first version of the sight for the german vtuber nayami

and the first i ever made so i hope you enjoy it.

i made two versions of it so you can choose which one you want to use.

its an universal sight so you can use it on all tanks.

the artwork i used for the sight is from her so check her out:

https://www.twitch.tv/nayami

#vtuber #anime #Nayami #LightmotifDE #sight #universal

#f84 #f84b #f84g #us #usa #france #italy #china #rockets #plane #collimator #sight #tinytim #thunderjet

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Special thanks to KnirkeDK!

Rocket and gun sight pack for the F84b and F84g Thunderjets. Intended for Tiny Tims at 600m and 1000m. Dive angle is very generous due to high average IAS, so come in shallow or steep!

Install by unzipping included UserSkins folder to your War Thunder game root and combine with any existing fold...

Universal sight pack I made (Can be used by any tank)

Template + Preview
You can edit .blk file if you want more customisation (I put comment after "//")

The 4 line above the X axis is for emergency situation when you set your range too far
(//Root and //Warning in .blk file)

Heightfinder apply for tank with ~2.5m height (Abrams, T10M, IS-2, ...)

Note:
SLOW/MED/FAST: Shell speed
RF: Heightfinder
ITL: Interlaced
LZ: Low zoom
S5/S10/S15: Size

Inspired by Minedeployder
https://live.warthunder.com/post/851372/en/

#universal

A customized game default sight

1. Shell correction ticks per 400m with rectified ticks' lengths
2. Variants with different correction number positions (one side/both sides)
3. Both green-red and default black-red color schemes provided
4. Modified central cross for clearer vision
5. Gun center(0m) prompt

Installation:
Extract and drop the blk files into [GameFolder]/UserSights/all_tanks

---

Source code (in JavaScript) for generating the sight can be found at https://github.com/pzvol/wt-sight-generator/tree/main/sights2 . Feel free to modify if anyone is i...

Realistic and semi-realistic gunsight reticles for German vehicles.

Alpha Test! CAUTION!!!
These sights are in the process of being modified and are totally incomplete.
The movable sights have different trajectories for secondary shells and machine guns than the actual ones.
These are simply FOV implemented on the ones that are still damaged from the update.


Updated sights created by @RideR2
Link to original pack: https://live.warthunder.com/post/675135/en/

The original sights FOV were broken and have been fixed. This pack contains only sights with FOV; if you nee...

Gun and rocket sights for all Corsairs. Includes sights for HVARs, Tiny Tims, and SNEBs.

TO USE ROCKETS use the main boxes at 600m distance with the indicated speed (such as above 420kmh in the first sight). The side aiming reticles are used at 3...

Yakumo Ezo universal sight (Mato Seihei no Slave)

One of my most favourite character of the series.

I hope you guys like it, if so leave a like. Thanks!

#anime #sight #matoseiheinoslave #yakumoezo

MBT_E1D3

All vehicles can be used，But it cannot be put in all_tanks。

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1a1_abrams

所有地面载具都可以使用这些瞄具，但不要把文件放入all_tanks文件夹中。

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1a1_abrams

~HISTORICAL M3 AND M3A3 BRADLEY SIGHTS~
4K, 1440p and 1080p
Link to semi-historical pack: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1102171/en/

The M3 Bradley uses the Integrated Sight Unit (Pictures 5 and 6), or ISU for short. This sight has a double magnification of 4x (6.6°) and 12x (2.2°). The field of view is terrible, and I understand why they tried to keep it a secret. You can't see!

The M3A3 Bradley uses the Improved Bradley Acquisition Subsystem, or IBAS for short. This highly advanced sight has 4x and 12x optical magnifications and 2x and 4x electron...

Kurumi universal sight (Date a Live)

As requested from @Suzuxio
Have fun with it. (It was quite hard to find a good picture of her)

As always, if you like it leave a like. Thanks!

#anime #sight #kurumitokisaki #date_a_live

根据https://live.warthunder.com/post/1091323/en/
做的汉化，右面的行驶数字之所以是51.4是因为我也事homo（悲
理论上仅适配豹2PL。
安装方法：
1：下载文件并解压
2：打开战雷安装文件夹
3：找到/创建“UserSights"文件夹
4：找到/创建"all_tanks"文件夹
5：把压缩包里的东西丢进去
6：启动游戏，设置--通用战斗设置--自定义瞄具--选择“DM43_2PL_JC”
注：上文中所有的引号均无需出现在文件夹名称中
意见留评论里就行，我不是专业的内容发布者，只是一时兴起把这个瞄具翻译了一下而已，不要催更。
顺带一提，要改这些字其实也不难，用记事本（更推荐notepad++）打开这个文件，然后ctrl+f搜索你想要的文字，然后定位过去改就行了。比如你嫌这个瞄具里的“120mm Rh120 L/44滑膛炮“太长了，就可以用上面的方法改掉。
#leopard #leopard2 #leopard2pl #chinese #translated #repost #reprint #poland #germany #modern #modernsight

As requested i made this one. I had a lot of fun doing it.

If you like it leave a like, Thanks!

#anime #sight #matoseiheinoslave #tenkaizumo

MEGA PLANE COLLIMATOR SIGHT PACK!
*ALL sights are in 1st-person cockpit view, I cannot change the 3rd-person ladder sight.*
Click on my profile picture and/or search for a specific sight for aiming instructions
Version 52

This pack contains custom User Skins that replace the collimator sights of planes so you can aim better, especially with rockets! Sights are all created with gun convergence set to 600m with Vertical Targeting OFF. INSTALL by unzipping the included UserSkins folder to your War Thunder game root directory and combine with any existing folder. ...

#anime #sight #matoseiheinoslave #Fubuki_Azuma

Sight for ZBD04A.

This is a conversion of my sight for BMP-3(https://live.warthunder.com/post/1100571/en/ ). For detailed introduction and usage, please have a look at that post.

Features:
1. 2 marks for shooting missiles;
2. Horizontal reticles for shooting 30mm APFSDS while moving (or shooting targets having horizontal speed);
3. Selected main weapon prompt

Updated on 2024.03.25
Added an alternative with small 50m correction ticks, for fine adjustment while using the IFV as an artillery.

Installation:
Extract and drop the blk file into [Game...
